title: 服务器后台显示关闭但服务器却一直是开启的状态
txt_content:
大致情况:因为服务器要换周目，然后准备删模组的时候，发现后台不仅关不了，ftp也不能删东西（可能是需要服务器关闭）
困扰了很久了，玩家也等着太久了
服务器关闭时出现的日志：net.minecraft.world.MinecraftException: Failed to check session lock for world .\Pilacarnus\SCWorld, aborting
at net.minecraft.world.storage.SaveHandler.func_75762_c(SaveHandler.java:106) ~[azy.class:?]
at net.minecraft.world.World.func_72906_B(World.java:3430) ~[aid.class:?]
at net.minecraft.world.chunk.storage.AnvilChunkLoader.func_75816_a(AnvilChunkLoader.java:167) ~[atj.class:?]
at net.minecraft.world.gen.ChunkProviderServer.func_73242_b(ChunkProviderServer.java:199) [lr.class:?]
at net.minecraft.world.gen.ChunkProviderServer.func_73156_b(ChunkProviderServer.java:273) [lr.class:?]
at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.redirect$onUpdateTimeLightAndEntitiesGetEntityTracker$zhj000(MinecraftServer.java:591) [MinecraftServer.class:?]
at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71190_q(MinecraftServer.java:721) [MinecraftServer.class:?]
at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71190_q(DedicatedServer.java:387) [ld.class:?]
at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71217_p(MinecraftServer.java:613) [MinecraftServer.class:?]
at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:471) [MinecraftServer.class:?]
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_144]
[15:57:09] [Server thread/ERROR]: Couldn't save chunk; already in use by another instance of Minecraft? 
net.minecraft.world.MinecraftException: Failed to check session lock for world .\Pilacarnus\SCWorld, aborting
at net.minecraft.world.storage.SaveHandler.func_75762_c(SaveHandler.java:106) ~[azy.class:?]
at net.minecraft.world.World.func_72906_B(World.java:3430) ~[aid.class:?]
at net.minecraft.world.chunk.storage.AnvilChunkLoader.func_75816_a(AnvilChunkLoader.java:167) ~[atj.class:?]
at net.minecraft.world.gen.ChunkProviderServer.func_73242_b(ChunkProviderServer.java:199) [lr.class:?]
at net.minecraft.world.gen.ChunkProviderServer.func_73156_b(ChunkProviderServer.java:273) [lr.class:?]
at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.redirect$onUpdateTimeLightAndEntitiesGetEntityTracker$zhj000(MinecraftServer.java:591) [MinecraftServer.class:?]
at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71190_q(MinecraftServer.java:721) [MinecraftServer.class:?]
at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71190_q(DedicatedServer.java:387) [ld.class:?]
at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71217_p(MinecraftServer.java:613) [MinecraftServer.class:?]
at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:471) [MinecraftServer.class:?]
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_144
日志也就到这里了。。知道的在帖内回答或者加Q3231245177

replies.author: 咕
replies.txt_content:
你的一个叫SCWorld的世界保存失败
应该是那个世界坏档了啥的

replies.author: sd1a54w
replies.txt_content: 在后台输入stop试试，或者让客服强关
